question: What tastes better than it smells?
What kind of room has no doors or windows?
What loses its head in the morning and gets it back at night?
What has 4 fingers and a thumb, but is not living?
What kind of tree is carried in your hand?
What has a single eye but cannot see?
What building has the most stories?
I can bring tears to your eyes; resurrect the dead, make you smile, and reverse time. I form in an instant but I last a life time. What am I?
What jumps higher than a building?
Time for the bonus questions: What always goes to bed with its shoes on?
Time for the bonus questions: What can one not keep, two hold, and three destroy?
Time for the bonus questions: The poor have me, the rich don't, and if you eat me, you'll die.What am I?
Time for the bonus questions: I build bridges of silver and crowns of gold. Who am I?
Time for the bonus questions: When you do not know what I am, then I am something. But when you know what I am, then I am nothing. What am I?

finale: Conrgratulations! You have completed the quiz!
